titles.title: Censuring Representative Bill Pascrell of New Jersey.
Censuring Representative Bill Pascrell of New Jersey.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ethics.

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption

bill.summary: This resolution censures Representative Bill Pascrell for filing complaints against attorneys representing the campaign of President Donald Trump. The resolution states that Representative Pascrell's conduct threatens the livelihoods of American citizens in a way that is not befitting an elected Member of the House of Representatives.
